Wrapper for terse::terse()

Source: R/utils.R
glimst.Rd

Wrapper for terse::terse()

Usage

glimst(x, p = "- ", w = 0, m = 20, s = " ")

Arguments

x

<list> or <data.frame> to be printed

p

<chr> prefix to be used for each line

w

<int> target width; 0 = auto; -1 = no limit

m

<int> maximum vector length anywhere in original object

s

<chr> separator to be used for each line

On this page
